title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.17 - Charges-small craft, responsibility for
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.17 - Charges-small craft, responsibility for

State Regulations

In the case of watercraft of 220 feet in length or under, charges for dockage are assessed against the vessel's agent, owner or
operator. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1242.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
